typical_weather: In December, Hanoi experiences cool and dry weather. The average temperature ranges from 15°C (59°F) to 20°C (68°F). It can get quite chilly in the evenings and early mornings, with temperatures dropping to around 10°C (50°F). The humidity is relatively low, and rainfall is minimal during this time of the year. However, occasional drizzles or light showers can still occur. Overall, December in Hanoi is considered to be mild and pleasant, but
